summary: Mega Millions is a big lottery game in the United States. It started in 1996 with six states and now includes 45 states, Washington D.C., and the U.S. Virgin Islands. Drawings happen on Tuesdays and Fridays at 11:00 p.m. Eastern Time. The jackpot starts at $20 million and grows when no one wins. The biggest jackpot was $1.602 billion in August 2023. Tickets cost $2 (soon to be $5) and you can win by matching six numbers. Some places offer a "Megaplier" for $3, which can multiply smaller prizes.
title: Mega Millions
